data.eml:eml: On some Linyphiidae of China, mainly from Taibai Shan, Qinling Mountains, Shaanxi Province (Arachnida: Araneae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tanasevitch, Andrei V. (2006): On some Linyphiidae of China, mainly from Taibai Shan, Qinling Mountains, Shaanxi Province (Arachnida: Araneae). Zootaxa 1325: 277-311, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273569
